headline: Our world
bodyText: Based in Copenhagen and owned and run by husband-and-wife, Creative Director Ditte Reffstrup and Founder Nicolaj Reffstrup since 2009, GANNI is the next interation of Scandinavian style â€“ Scandi 2.0. GANNI is all about making women feel even more confident in their own skin. We strive to do better every day to become the most responsible we can be.
